Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Longport in 1968...
Injured on 6/6/1969 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/1971, off Jacques Griffin (PEN)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1972...
Hit for the cycle against Penn on 6/12/1973...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Penn on 6/12/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1973, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1973, hitting .330 with 9 HR, 27 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1973, hitting .391 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Injured on 9/8/1976 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Second Base in 1976...
Injured on 6/18/1980 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/12/1981 to a 4-year deal worth $5,275,200 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1982, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
